title: Polygon (MATIC) Faces High Volatility – Here’s Where to Invest Instead
description: Polygon (MATIC) remains highly volatile after the SEC’s negative label prompted investors to opt for other platforms. title: What To Expect With The Recent Bitcoin Miners’ Selling Pressure
description: Bitcoin miners play a crucial role in the cryptocurrency ecosystem, as they validate transactions and secure the network. title: Is a Massive Partnership Incoming for Cardano and Vodafone? Industry Giant Tweets About ADA NFTs
description: Vodafone Germany’s tweet about Cardano NFTs has sparked speculation about a possible partnership between the telecommunications giant and the blockchain platform. title: Whale Ditches LINK and BNB for Pepe and ETH: On-Chain Data
description:
Lookonchain, the blockchain tracking firm, revealed in a tweet published earlier today that a whale withdrew more than $1.5 trillion Pepe (PEPE) from Binance over the past 24 hours. According to the post, the whale withdrew 1.93 trillion PEPE worth approximately $3.03 million from the leading crypto exchange. This whale reportedly sold 97,735 Chainlink (LINK), […]
